StoryText: My work needs people to work the upcoming holidays and I have to choose one.
Question: Which one do I choose?

OptionResult.Result: I work Christmas Eve and end up missing %FullName:NPC:1%'s party that %Pron:1:1% invited me to.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% is so mad at me for picking Christmas Eve and missing %Pron:1:3% party. I am wishing I picked a different day now too. I forgot about the party! And most of my shift I ended up having to lug boxes around and rearrange stuff. What a day! At least I got some money.

OptionResult.Result: I feel bummed out for missing out on my friends and family's activities this day, but I make a bunch of money.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% has a party on Christmas Eve that I go to and that's fun, but missing Christmas Day entirely because I had to work, this just bums me out. The only redeeming factor is that I made a ton of money.

OptionResult.Result: I work New Year's Eve and still get out with plenty of time to hang out with friends!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: This turned out to be a good holiday season! %FullName:NPC:1% had %Pron:1:3% Christmas Eve party, I was off Christmas Day, worked New Year's Eve and still had time to hang out with friends. I think I made the right choice for work!

OptionResult.Result: I get to do everything I want over the holidays, but I am so wiped out working New Year's Day. All I want to do is sleep!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1%'s Christmas Eve party, a long Christmas Day, a VERY LONG New Year's Eve... this was a great time. But I hardly slept and then had to go into work New Year's Day. I just want the day to be over so I can go home. But hey, I had a good time. Even if I am feeling a slight bit ill.
